settingsDescription: Adjust application preferences like interface language, theme, and default export format.
historyDescription: View, load, manage, or filter your past searches. Identical searches update the timestamp of the existing entry.
historyClearConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to clear the entire search history?
historyFilterPlaceholder: Filter by name, path, query, extensions...
historyNoResults: No history entries match your filter.
fuzzySearchBooleanEnabledLabel: Enable Fuzzy Search in Boolean Queries
fuzzySearchBooleanDescription: When enabled, automatically applies fuzzy matching to terms in Boolean queries when exact matches aren't found.
fuzzySearchNearEnabledLabel: Enable Fuzzy Search in NEAR Function
fuzzySearchNearDescription: When enabled, allows the NEAR function to find approximate matches for terms that don't match exactly.
wholeWordMatchingDescription: When enabled, search terms will only match whole words, not substrings within words (e.g., searching for 'log' won't match 'catalog').
